cgcloud__Field_Sales_Activity__c.name: cgcloud__Field_Sales_Activity__c
cgcloud__Field_Sales_Activity__c.description: Stores the details of the field sales activity object. Field Sales Activity (FSA) covers a set of job definition lists.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Phase__c.description: Phase of the field sales activity.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: Date from which the Field Sales Activity is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Date until which the Field Sales Activity is valid.
